column1: Appendix table 11: Prisoners in custody of correctional authorities in the U.S. territories and commonwealths, yearend 2005 and 2006
Author(s): William J. Sabol, Heather Couture, and Paige M. Harrison
Appendix table 11. Prisoners in custody of correctional authorities in the U.S. territories and commonwealths, yearend 2005 and 2006
Commonwealth of the Northern Marina Islands

*The number of prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year per 100,000 persons in the resident population.  July 1, 2006 population estimates were provided by the U.S. Census Bureau, International Data Base.
